questions.question: If 30% of a number is 60, what is the number?
A shirt's price is reduced by 20% from $50. What is the new price?
questions.explanation: 20% reduction means 80% of original price remains. So, new price = $50 × (80/100) = $40

questions.question: In a class of 50 students, 15 are girls. What percentage of the class are boys?
questions.explanation: Number of boys = 50 - 15 = 35, Percentage of boys = (35/50) × 100 = 70%
